data.message: Dear FB, PLEASE, create an opt out option for people who don't want pop up notifications to appear on their screen. They cover the left one-third of the page about 90 percent of the time, so it makes your site almost unusable. It's incredibly frustrating. Thanks for your attention, Dave H.

replies.message: Hi David. We hear your frustration and appreciate your feedback. Please let us know how we can improve your Facebook experience here: http://bit.ly/2rKvKyj. -Stephanie
